Create and memorize your PIN Repeat your PIN You will use this PIN every time you need to unlock your wallet, so make sure you memorize it We want to make sure you\'ve memorized it

@string/common_success You successfully set the quick pin @string/common_continue You successfully changed the quick pin BACK TO HOME

Camera permission not provided\nOpen App Settings Having trouble scanning the QR Code?\nPlease try an alternative way Having trouble scanning the QR Code?\nPlease try an alternative way Grant permission Go to settings

Personal ID Driving license Add document Select a document to add" Success Document requested. Please wait for the confirmation Confirm Scan QR You can choose to scan a QR code Or SCAN QR Add your personal ID Select a way to add it" Successfully added PID You can begin using your wallet Confirm
Hey, %s Welcome to your digital wallet Use Wallet
Issuer %1$s wants to issue the following in your wallet Please confirm the issuance of the following ISSUE @string/common_cancel @string/common_success @string/common_in_progress Your documents from %1$s have been successfully issued. Your documents from %1$s have been successfully issued except %2$s Your documents from %1$s have been requested. You will be notified when they have been issued to your wallet. @string/common_continue @string/common_ok Wallet needs to be activated first with a National ID Invalid transaction code format. Length should be between %1$d to %2$d digits and only numeric characters are allowed. Unable to fetch and process the credential offer
Cancel issuance process? Cancel will redirect you back to the documents list with no new documents CONTINUE ISSUANCE @string/common_cancel %1$s requires verification Type the %1$d-digit transaction code you received
Something went wrong issuing your document(s)
Shown above Vehicle category code User Pseudonym Yes No
Verifier \ requests the following The requested document is not available in your EUDI Wallet. Please contact the authorised issuer for further information. Please review carefully before sharing your data. \ Why we need your data? Your selection of data to be shared may impact the service SHARE @string/common_cancel Cancel information sharing? Cancel will redirect you back to the login without sharing any information CONTINUE SHARING @string/common_cancel Why we need your data It allows us to verify your identity with the requesting party @string/common_ok Trusted relying party A relying party is considered trusted when it meets predefined criteria for security, data protection, compliance, and responsible data handling. Trust is reinforced through assessments, audits, and certifications. @string/common_ok Verification Data male female Not available

You successfully shared information with %1$s Verifier
Security Check Failed Your device\'s security check failed (%1$s). Please ensure your device meets security requirements. Your device is not secure because no screen lock is set up. Please set up a PIN, pattern, or password in your device settings (%1$s). Your device appears to be rooted or modified, which poses security risks (%1$s). Please use an unmodified device.
